title: Rfam
summary: Rfam is a database containing information about non-coding RNA (ncRNA) families and other structured RNA elements.  It is an annotated, open access database originally developed at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute in collaboration with Janelia Farm,[1][2][3][4] and currently hosted at the European Bioinformatics Institute.[5] Rfam is designed to be similar to the Pfam database for annotating protein families.
